meanings.definition: The presence of bacteria in the blood.
meanings.sent1: Bacteremia can be dangerous if not treated promptly.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the patient with bacteremia after running blood tests.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria in the blood threw a party, causing bacteremia in the body.
meanings.sent4: The bacteremia spread like wildfire through the bloodstream, overwhelming the immune system.
meanings.sent5: The image of tiny bacteria swimming in the blood helped me understand bacteremia better.

meanings.definition: Infection of the bloodstream by bacteria.
meanings.sent1: Severe bacteremia requires immediate medical attention.
meanings.sent2: The hospital treated the patient for bacteremia with antibiotics.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria in the blood played hide and seek, causing bacteremia in the body.
meanings.sent4: The bacteremia invaded the bloodstream like an army storming a castle.
meanings.sent5: The thought of bacteria invading the bloodstream made me shudder at the idea of bacteremia.
